#include<cstring>
#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,n,c;
    long k,arr1[1001],arr2[1001],i;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {   c=0;
        scanf("%d%ld",&n,&k);
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            scanf("%ld",&arr1[i]);
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            scanf("%ld",&arr2[i]);
        sort(arr1,arr1+n);
        sort(arr2,arr2+n);
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            if((arr1[i]+arr2[n-1-i])>=k)
                c++;
        }
        if(c==n)
            cout<<"YES"<<"\n";
        else cout<<"NO"<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
